titles: The seven champions of Christendome Acted at the Cocke-pit, and at the Red-Bull in St. Iohns streete, with a generall liking. And never printed till this yeare 1638. Written by I.K.
author: Kirke, John, d. 1643.
publisher: Printed by I. Okes, and are to be sold by Iames Becket at his shop in the Inner Temple Gate,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Christian saints --  Drama --  Early works to 1800.
